meaningInfo: A festival can't be happening all the time. Then it wouldn't be special, it would just be a party building, so they can only happen on special occasions.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>occasion</kanji> this time is to celebrate your wonderful <reading>cy</reading>borg (<ja>さい</ja>). It's about time you did something nice for it.
readingInfo: Your cyborg has been really great lately. Your wife loves it. It saved the world. It's nice of you to take this occasion to show the cyborg how much it means to you all with a festival.
